#summary An Example Rules File
#labels example,rules,file,jerrules

= {{{ExampleRules.rl}}} =
{{{
<brules type="if" name="ExampleRules">
	<objs>
		<obj name="objA" clas="my.package.ObjA"/>
		<obj name="objB" clas="my.package.ObjB"/>
	</objs>
	<rules>
		<rule>		
			<when>
				objA.getSomeProperty()==true && objA.someBooleanMethod()
			</when>
			<then>
				objB.setSomeTargetProperty("Hello World")
                                System.out.println("Laugh out loud")
			</then>
		</rule>
		<rule>		
			<when>
				objA.getSomeOtherProperty()==true || objA.someOtherBooleanMethod()
			</when>
			<then>
				objB.setSomeOtherTargetProperty(1)
                                my.package.ObjC objC = new my.package.ObjC()
                                objB.setSomeObject(objC)
                                System.out.println("Laugh out louder")
			</then>
		</rule>
	</rules>
</brules>
}}}
